elements.name: Successful login with password and the username is registered in the database

steps.name: I have opened the application in the browser
I have been navigated to the login page
I enter username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
I click the login button
I should be redirected to the home page
I should see the notification "Products"

elements.name: Unsuccessful login with Username and Password unregistered in the database

steps.name: I have opened the application in the browser
I have been navigated to the login page
I enter username "standarduser" and password "secretsauce"
I click the login button

result.error_message:
org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<...user in this service[!]> but was:<...user in this service[]>
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:115)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:144)
	at stepDefinitions.LoginTest.I_should_see_the_message_on_the_login_form(LoginTest.java:49)
	at ✽.I should see the message "Username and password do not match any user in this service!" on the login form(file:///D:/BER/KAIST/SEM6/PPL3/PRAKTIK/week12/3/AutomationWebTesting/src/test/resources/features/Login.feature:18)

steps.name: I should see the message "Username and password do not match any user in this service!" on the login form

arguments.val: "Username and password do not match any user in this service!"

I have been navigated to the login page

I click the login button
